title: Diamond 4 LFT
body:
Currently Diamond 4 Nidalee main, pretty flexible in roles

Mid > ADC > Support > Top > Jungle.

Looking for Diamond + Team also.

Add me in game if interested in recruiting me ;)

Stay Bronze

replies.body: I have been trying to add you man, but it will not let me, saying that your name isn't an actual name, so add me, just recently changed my name its: ASC Tachia
